abstract: Defines the destination of a drag and drop operation that handles the dropped content with a closure that you specify.

declaration.code: @MainActor @preconcurrency func dropDestination<T>(for payloadType: T.Type = T.self, action: @escaping ([T]) -> Void) -> some TabContent<Self.TabValue> where T : Transferable

overview:
## Return Value

A view that calls `action` when elements are dropped onto the tab.

## Discussion

The dropped content can be provided as binary data, file URLs, or file promises.

The drop destination is the tab content.

This example adds a profile to a group when the user drops it onto onto that group.
title: dropDestination(for:action:)
